item.description:
The GBBCC is closed for several months, and some folks want to 'do something vegetarian' or 'do something vegan' around the holiday time.

99 Crescent St, Auburndale, MA 02466

$20 per dinner: Take-out version is also available, which benefits David Snieckus, but doesn't contribute socially to the evening's event, but "it's OK" if you want to do that.

For menu, go to: http://www.davidsnieckus.com/dinners.php

SCHEDULE YOUR ATTENDANCE AT:

http://www.meetup.com/Whole-Health-Dinners-and-Gatherings-Greater-Boston/events/41946822/

Do NOT show up if you haven't scheduled online.
item.how_to_find_us: The group will be small, and everyone commits to pay $20/person for the vegan dinner

group.name: The Boston Mandarin Chinese Language Meetup Group

item.name: OT: Holiday Special Community Vegan Dinner Gathering!
